sample.input: @VirginAmerica Just trying to book tickets to NYC and facing super fun broken styling. Don't worry, I'll keep trying :)
@VirginAmerica ok! first time flying with you tonight :)
@VirginAmerica @JezzieGoldz would have been a rough trip but LUCKILY we were on a #virginamerica flight. #weather
@united you think you boarded flight AU1066 too early? I think so.
@united despite my bag not making it to Newark good informative email tracking updates help!
@united #worst2unitedflightsever UA1429 IAD to LAS 2/19 mechanical problems - switched aircraft delayed 3.5 hours!
@united maybe one day you'll be the one quoted on http://t.co/mJkpgVXmPC
@united i need it there before she lands so she can have the EWR baggage claim file to have it sent but the employee has not droppeditoffyet

J
@united @reccewife with the exception of everything you've asked for. Heh

@united any chance you could help rebook?? My flight Cancelled Flightled

@united no still trying to get home.
@united well played, ^LO.
@united love being told you would issue a refund when you couldn't get us out of the way of a hurricane to have it denied

@united all good, didn't die or anything. As they say "you get what you pay for"!
@united looking back - never heard from anyone - I had to call and frankly got standard SOP - still think about it today
@united makes total sense, except flight wasn't full :) I've got empty seats around me & overheads were more than half open when I boarded.
@united 1 hour since boarding began and we're still sitting at the gate.  #UA507
@united I will be stunned if my bags are in Hartford with me.  The ORD ground crew only had an hour to move my bags 200 yards
@united still can't dm, it's LH7631 on 21/2/15
@united This is with regard to a flight from a couple weeks ago. I'm very frustrated with your policies & expressing that.
@united are my bags here yet?  They were at Palm Springs airport.  I was at LAX.  How come I beat my bags here.
@united thanks for the offer, but I finally made it to my destination, albeit hours Late Flight.
@united the refund request functionality on http://t.co/5IMDckODfx is broken.i get a time out error.
@united + besides, no small degree of self-interest. We take that route several times a year & would hate to be in that situation.
@SouthwestAir wifi stays connected about the lifetime of a higgs boson

@SouthwestAir oh no worries. Just have never seen that before until today. I mean‚Ä¶it is a great card üòÄ

@SouthwestAir alas, it was pretty full so we had to entertain ourselves with witty repartee ...

@JetBlue I know, but I wanted to pass it along. Not good for the "T5 experience" esp for someone who flies 2-3 times a month.
@JetBlue Even 5 years after the earthquake...Haiti still needs helps in rebuilding #flyingitforward

Always been a @JetBlue fan but maybe next time I'll fly @VirginAmerica for real customer service.

@USAirways and now you can't even accommodate us by letting us fly in to another airport?! Horrible service for your fault!!!

@USAirways ok thanks

@USAirways okay, great. Thank you!
@USAirways Can someone please answer my call. I have been waaaaaaiting!!!
@USAirways stuck at the gate in Charlotte, NC waiting for "release papers" and a fix for a broken computer system.

@USAirways ok. Thank you
@USAirways but don't worry! They found a hotel, it's only 45min away. I got there around 11:30pm, no problem.
@USAirways I needed to be at my destination by lunchtime today. No one could get us on a flight, but I've since learned @Delta had one!
@USAirways but it's not their fault, because their policy says they at least got us to our destination. Really?
@USAirways that's where we are now. Thank you.
